column5: Abiomed up 3 on FDA confirmation of safety of Impella heart pump ABMD seekingalphacomnews34657
ABMD Not making any new lows despite market weakness good sign
good news from ABMD regarding FDA safety the stock has been way oversold this year and they are doing nothing but good things expanding impalla into new markets
ABMD Impella RP is the most studied rightsided device and the only percutaneous technology with FDA approval designating it as safe and effective for right heart support

ABMD US FDA validates Impella RP heart pump is safe and effective for treatment of right heart failure FDA letter comes after the FDA examined results from ABMDs 18month postapproval study PAS of 42 Impella RP patients investorsabiomedcomnews
ABMD 13m ago FDA Confirms Impella RP is Safe and Effective Only RightSided Device with FDA Approval businesswirecomnewshome
